ai.summary: Lock-Keeper's Pad is a short, easy riverside walk in the UK. At 2.9 km, the route is suitable for all ages and offers a peaceful stroll with gentle scenery along a waterway.
ai.terrain_summary: Flat to gently undulating terrain with well-maintained paths, occasional muddy sections, and wooden boardwalks where the water edges narrow. Surface includes compacted gravel, tarmac, and some grassy patches. Expect wet conditions after rain.
ai.safety_notes: Suitable for most pedestrians, but be mindful of changing weather and slippery surfaces after rain. Keep an eye on water levels near locks and avoid narrow edges during high winds. Bring a phone and map, and supervise children around water features.
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn; moderate temperatures and drier days tend to be most pleasant, though the trail is accessible year-round with appropriate gear.

seo.title: Lock-Keeper's Pad - Easy 2.9 km UK Riverside Walk
seo.meta_description: Discover Lock-Keeper's Pad, a short and easy 2.9 km riverside walk in the UK. Practical tips, terrain details, safety notes, and gear for a pleasant outdoor outing.
